text: Polish national football team before match against Hungary during Olympic Games (26th May 1924, Paris). Zdzisław Styczeń (born 16 October 1894 in Przemyśl - died on 20 December 1978 in Kraków) was a footballer from Poland (midfielder) who played for such clubs as Cracovia and Wisła Kraków. He played in the first game of the Poland national football team. Styczeń was also a part of the Poland national football team that participated in the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== * Player profile on pkol.pl Category:1894 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Polish footballers Category:Poland international footballers Category:KS Cracovia players Category:Wisła Kraków players Category:Olympic footballers of Poland Category:Footballers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:People from Przemyśl Category:Sportspeople from Podkarpackie Voivodeship Category:Polish Austro-Hungarians Category:People from the Kingdom of Galicia and Lodomeria Category:Association football midfielders
title: Zdzisław Styczeń
